comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: These photos were taken during a miserable six-day heat wave in New York City that left 146 dead and killed 600 horses. Story in the New York Times, July 8, 1911: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9505E...
